comment: Parameterize the Pythagorean triples. If ` A ` , ` B ` , and ` C ` are naturals, then they obey the Pythagorean triple formula iff they are parameterized by three naturals. This proof follows the Isabelle proof at ~ http://afp.sourceforge.net/entries/Fermat3_4.shtml . This is Metamath 100 proof #23. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Apr-2014.)
